talents.option1: 500.0 Distance Auto Remnant in Ball Lightning

abilities.desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts [12] seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.
abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.notes: The explosion actually hits units in a 260 radius, but will only be triggered in 235.

abilities.desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.
abilities.name: Electric Vortex

abilities.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.
abilities.name: Overload

abilities.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10+0.65% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.
abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.notes: Storm Spirit is invulnerable during Ball Lightning.
